## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G05970](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G05970)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATLACS6, LACS6</u>
- **Gene Name:** long-chain acyl-CoA synthetase 6
- **Description:**   long-chain acyl-CoA synthetase 6;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2083013

- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
